channel.title: Kde on Carlibrated!
channel.description: Recent content in Kde on Carlibrated!

item.title: Linux seen through different Windows
item.author: carl@halls.farm (Carl Hall)
item.description: I’m a sucker for new features. I love to see new gadgets, widgets and UI updates but shy away from bells and whistles. After the shininess has dulled and the day-to-day functionality is what I’m left with, I tend to go with function & performance over form. For that, I tend to try a new window manager or desktop environment about every 6 months on my linux installations. I’ve just recently moved from LXDE to KDE (4.2) to Gnome (2.24.1). Here are my thoughts for what they’re worth
